alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:55PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Weld County through 230 PM MDT... At 155 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Rockport, or 10 miles south of Cheyenne, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carr, Rockport and Natural Fort. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
